name: Pha-Pha-Phases
description:
A quick game about going through the stages of grief  for the former versions of yourself. Made for My First Game Jam: Summer 2020.

Unfortunately, I ran out of time. July has proved to be way more complicated and draining than I had hoped, so I scaled things down. Ideas for a few Tyranobuilder games have been put on the back burner, but I really like this base concept.

My execution of that concept, however,  may leave much to be desired. Before moving on to new things, I intend to rework this game's script, add at least one new room, and overhaul two existing rooms. After that, let the visual novels begin.

- Chris
